snippet: Without Zach Randolph in the lineup, the Memphis Grizzlies have lost all semblance of order on offense.
abstract: Without Zach Randolph in the lineup, the Memphis Grizzlies have lost all semblance of order on offense.
lead_paragraph: The Memphis Grizzlies are in some considerable trouble, and for at least six or seven more weeks, Zach Randolph won't be able to right their wrongs on the strength of his mid-post game. A nasty medial collateral ligament tear ensured that much, and though Randolph is fortunate to have dodged a need for surgery, his absence has sent Memphis' offense into a tailspin.

headline.main: Randolph's Injury Costs Grizzlies Offense, Order
